MemberSignature.Value: protected internal int CompareFrameworkVersions (string versionA, string versionB);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig instance int32 CompareFrameworkVersions(string versionA, string versionB) cil managed
Protected Friend Function CompareFrameworkVersions (versionA As String, versionB As String) As Integer
protected public: int CompareFrameworkVersions(System::String ^ versionA, System::String ^ versionB);

Docs.param: The first .NET Framework version to compare.
The second .NET Framework version to compare.
Docs.summary: Compares two .NET Framework versions and determines which version comes before the other one.
Docs.returns: An integer value that specifies the sort order position of a .NET Framework version instance relative to another version instance. A value of 0 means the two values are equal, a value of -1 indicates that precedes , and a value of 1 indicates that comes after .
